matrix.content:
Wake up, Neo...
The Matrix has you... üíä

fortuneMessages: A bug in the code is worth two in the documentation.
There are only 10 types of people: those who understand binary and those who don't.
Programming is 10% science, 20% ingenuity, and 70% getting the ingenuity to work with the science.
Always code as if the person who ends up maintaining your code is a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit.
Unix is user-friendly. It's just very selective about who its friends are.
I'm not lazy, I'm just in energy-saving mode.
If at first you don't succeed, call it version 1.0.
Computers are fast; programmers keep them slow.
The code that you write makes you a programmer. The code that you delete makes you a good one.
sudoPhrases: We trust you have received the usual lecture from the local System Administrator.
Nice try, but you're not root here!
With great power comes great electricity bill.
Access denied. Have you tried turning it off and on again?
I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.
You shall not pass! - Gandalf the Root
This incident will be reported to the System Administrator (who is probably you)
sudo: feeling lucky today? Try again!
With sudo comes great responsibility. Use it wisely, young padawan.
cowsayMessages: Have you tried the Konami Code?
Eat more chicken! Wait, wrong mascot...
I'm not a real cow, I'm a terminal cow!
Have you checked the hidden files today?
I herd you like CTF challenges...
hackSequences: üíª HACK COMPLETE! You are now 1337 h4x0r!

bsodContent.title: :( Your PC ran into a problem and needs to restart.
bsodContent.message: We're just collecting some error info, and then we'll restart for you.

backdoorMessages: Hidden message: "In the shadows of /etc, wisdom awaits"
Hint: Check .shadow_config in level 2 hidden directories
